overview: The Luggage comprises an array of intertwined scenes featuring activities with such props as a TV set, high-heeled shoes, mirror, torch. The film emanates physical tension, accentuated through dynamic editing and the aesthetics of compulsive repetition, characteristic of Sosnowskiâ€™s practice. It presents murky explorations, shaky scenes of convulsion, magic rituals with an undertone of eroticism.
title: The Luggage
